summary: Provides Django unit tests that verify the behavior of model metadata utilities, including automatic field management after removal, field discovery, relationship handling, label processing, option handling, parent enumeration, private field encapsulation, related object retrieval, and relationâ€‘tree management.
business_intent: Ensures the correctness and stability of model metadata functions in a Django application by detecting regressions, confirming expected warnings, and validating that manual assignments to automatically managed fields have no effect across Django versions.
